title: First
content: Freelancers or Clients come on board the platform and provides details of the project and if they want they can connect to DAOs

title: Second
content: Freelancers and Clients Decides on the checkpoints of the project and once they agree the contract is pushed

title: Third
content: Upon completion of each checkpoint both client and freelancer signs a checkpoint contract and the payment is disposed

title: Fourth
content: After Project completion both Freelancer and Client are provided with completion NFT for further validation
